name: Swordsfriends
description:
Last updated 05-05-2015.
KNOWN BUGS
> Sometimes you can infinite jump.
> Hold Start for a couple seconds to reset. NOT A BUG BUT USEFUL INFO
> The Crusher makes you invincible. FIXED
> I think the menu may be a bit broken. FIXED

A tiny 2-player fightgam about swords and frenemies.
Uses two Xbox360 controllers.

Made for TOJam 2015, "It's All Come To This".
Game by Jonah Davidson, aka Hangedman (@JonahD).
Music by Adam Sakiyama (@adamsakiyama)!

http://hangedmandesign.com
